\varepsilon =
      \left( \begin{array}{c}
      {\displaystyle  \frac{\partial w}{\partial x} +
                      \frac{\partial u}{\partial z} }  \\[2mm]
      {\displaystyle  \frac{\partial w}{\partial y} +
                      \frac{\partial v}{\partial z} }
                                     \end{array} \right)
